name: The Stoning of Saint Stephen
description: The Stoning of Saint Stephen; Lieven van Lathem (Flemish, about 1430 - 1493); Ghent (written), Belgium; 1469; Tempera colors, gold leaf, gold paint, silver paint, and ink on parchment; Leaf: 12.4 x 9.2 cm (4 7/8 x 3 5/8 in.); Ms. 37, fol. 24v; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: The Stoning of Saint Stephen
medium: Tempera colors, gold leaf, gold paint, silver paint, and ink on parchment
